spas.nreading

Class XMLParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • spas.nreading.XMLParser

  • public class XMLParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses XML into NElement objects. Needs InputSource to actually do something. Can only parse XML-files as specified in the Noppa API.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lauri Lavanti
    See Also:
    NReader

    • Method Detail

      • parseFile

        public static java.util.List<? extends NElement> parseFile(org.xml.sax.InputSource is)
        Parses XML-file into NElement-objects. Gathers all the information relevant to NElement-type into NElement, NCourse or NEvent forms.
        Parameters:
        is - InputSource for the XML-file to parse.
        Returns:
        Objectified version of the XML-file, List with class that extends NElement.

        Returns:
        List of organizations contained in Document.

      • parseCourse

        private static java.util.List<NCourse> parseCourse(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
        Parses a course correctly from the Document. Gets more information than parseCourses(doc). The reason why this method returns a list as well even though it will always contain one Object at most, is to enable calling of only one method in this class.
        Parameters:
        doc - Document to be parsed.
        Returns:
        A list containing the one course parse correctly from Document.
